summary: removes some snow that has Literally no purpose in the game what so ever
descriptionHtml: Removes some snow that always has always bothered me when playing skyrim , it gives literally no purpose other getting in your way and covering up a few clipping areas that you would actively have to be looking for , some might call it nice looking , but if you think its nice why are you looking at this mod? also it gives me A small Fps Boost , 1-2 fps most of the time . also i know someone probably already made a mod like this , but im to lazy to find it , if you made a mod that already does this let me know and i'll take this down .
author: ARandomPerson
